Description: Point entity which, when triggered, creates an explosion which damages everything damageable around it.

KeyDescriptions.keyDescription: Set name of {{ entname }} so other entities can trigger it to create explosion. Every trigger use-type works uniformly. Can be kill-targeted.
Explosion magnitude. Greater values mean bigger explosion size and damage. Note that explosion damage values above 200 are known to cause damage even through walls.

keyChoices.choiceDescription: If set, the explosion deals no damage.
If set, the env_explosion entity won't be removed after being triggered, so you can use it again.
If set, the explosion shows no fireball.
If set, the explosion shows no smoke.
If set, the explosion causes no decal.
If set, the explosion creates no sparks.
